Lu: La commande a été passée en utilisant%1.

Mon: Thank you for your order from %store_name.

Lu: Une fois votre colis expédié, nous vous enverrons un numéro de suivi.

Mon: You can check the status of your order by logging into your account."
Lu: Vous pouvez vérifier le statut de votre commande en en vous connectant à votre compte ."

Lu: Si vous avez des questions sur votre commande, vous pouvez nous envoyer un e-mail à l'adresse %store_email ."

Mon: Your shipping confirmation is below. Thank you again for your business.
Lu: Votre confirmation d'expédition est ci-dessous. Merci encore pour vos affaires.

Mon: Sendcloud | The Number 1 Shipping Tool | Contact

Lu: pour le support et plus d'informations.
une agence numérique à service complet.

Mon: This feature is not available in Global view. To access it, please select a store view.
Lu: This feature is not available in Global view. To access it, please select a store view.

Mon: We allow global connection to Sendcloud for legacy purposes. To use new delivery methods such as nominated day or embedded service points, please switch to store view and connect it to Sendcloud. Please be aware if you keep both global and store view connection to Sendcloud, you may have double orders for that store.
Lu: We allow global connection to Sendcloud for legacy purposes. To use new delivery methods such as nominated day or embedded service points, please switch to store view and connect it to Sendcloud. Please be aware if you keep both global and store view connection to Sendcloud, you may have double orders for that store.

Mon: Service Point must be selected before order purchase. Please return to shipping and select service point.
Lu: "La méthode en Point Relais doit être sélectionnée avant la commande. Veuillez retourner dans la section "mes envois" et sélectionner un point relais. "

Mon: Delivery day must be selected before order purchase. Please return to shipping and select delivery date.
Lu: "Delivery day must be selected before order purchase. Please return to shipping and select delivery date."
